Previous: Introduction Up: Prerequisites Next: Views

Like in the simple-tutorial we want to use maven 3 to build and deploy our application.

We should be able to start an embedded tomcat-server with maven running the elearning-application: 

    mvn t7:run

If we want to start the application, then execute foregoing command in the jpasecurity-jsf-elearning-integration-test folder.

If everything works all right, tomcat started successfully and you can visit the elearning-application here(jsf) and here(cdi) respectively
